This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

Toggle Menu

# Atis Jurka

Position

Trustee

Email

[Email](https://www.townofpalmerlake.com/email-contact/node/16756/field_email "Email Atis Jurka (opens in a new window)")

Profile

Elected:  2024 for a four-year term

Atis has been a resident of the Town since 2007. He has served on the Elephant Rock Advisory Committee and is current president of Palmer Lake Economic Development Group (PLEDG). 

Atis is also an active member of American Legion.

Feel free to reach out to Atis using the email link above.

**Term End:** December 2028

[Print](https://www.townofpalmerlake.com/print/pdf/node/16756)
